What is an unspent space?! You probably found this website from a note on nostr or a tweet on twitter, or maybe you heard it on a podcast. And you might be curious, but also wondering, what is an unspent space? Bitcoiner spaces Essentially an unspent space is waiting to be occupied by bitcoiners‚Ä¶

Episode 2: Satoshi's Place Crispy chats with Adam, the owner of Satoshi's Place, a bitcoin hub located in Bury (near Manchester) in the UK. We cover how and why he started, what the challenges have been and how the future is looking. Twitter links: unspent.space:  https://twitter.com/unspentspace‚Ä¶

Episode 1: Chris's Intro Welcome to the first episode of the unspent.space podcast. In this episode, we delve into the genesis of unspent.space, the origins in Melbourne and discuss how the team was formed. Welcome! Welcome to the unspent.space site. Whether you're trying to start your own space or joining others, this community will help you join the dots. What is unspent.space? unspent.space started out as a cool name to describe the project for creating a permanent space for bitcoiners in Melbourne‚Ä¶
